summary: A basic mod to improve the shivs stats in game
descriptionHtml:
1 Description
2 How to get a shiv
3 Installation
4 permissions
5 Credits
Description
I have improved base damage from 5 to 15 I have halved the weight to 1 had I have made the shiv swing faster.
I made this mod because when I was playing the "no one ecapes cidhna mine" quest the npcs made it see, like it was a good weapon only to find out it was a steel dagger which was worth less and had a different skin.
How to get a shiv 
To get a shiv you need to do the quest "no-one escape cidhna mine" or you can use the console commands. For those who don't know to open console commands press "`" the key next to "1" then type in "player.additem 000426C8 1" and you will get a shiv
Installation to install this download it with the mod manager then activate it or download it manually then put it into your "data" folder.
author: Crashking54
